verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus, King Most Wonderful, Thou Conqueror Renowned, Thou Sweetness Most Ineffable, In Whom All Joys Are Found{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When Once Thou Visitest The Heart, Then Truth Begins To Shine, Then Earthly Vanities Depart, Then Kindles Love Divine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus, Light Of All Below, Thou Fount Of Life And Fire, Surpassing All The Joys We Know, And All We Can Desire;{/lang-eng}
